Package org.forgerock.openig.util

Miscellaneous utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Clearable An interface for an object whose value(s) can be cleared.
EnumerableMap<K,V> A readable map-like interface whose keys and size can also be determined.
FullList<E> Consolidates all discrete list interface operations into a single interface.
FullMap<K,V> Consolidates all discrete map interface operations into a single interface.
Indexed<T> Interface of an object that can be indexed with a unique key.
ReadableList<E> A readable list-like interface.
ReadableMap<K,V> A readable map-like interface.
ScopedFactory<S,T> A factory interface for scoped objects.
WritableList<E> A writable list-like interface.
WritableMap<K,V> A writable map-like interface.
 

Class Summary
CaseInsensitiveMap<V> An implementation of a map whose keys are case-insensitive strings.
CaseInsensitiveSet An implementation of a set whose values are case-insensitive strings.
DuckType<T> Provides a bridge between Java static typing and dynamic typing of objects.
EnumUtil Utility class for accessing Java enum types.
ExtensibleFieldMap A FieldMap that can be extended with arbitrary keys.
FieldMap Exposes public, non-primitive, non-static field members of an object as a map.
ISO8601 TODO: Description.
JsonValueUtil Provides additional functionality to JsonValue.
ListDecorator<E> Contains another list, which is uses as its basic source of data, possibly transforming the data along the way.
Loader Provides methods for dynamically loading classes.
MapDecorator<K,V> Contains another map, which is uses as its basic source of data, possibly transforming the data along the way.
MultiValueMap<K,V> Wraps a map for which the values are lists, providing a set of convenience methods for handling list values.
SetDecorator<E> Contains another set, which is uses as its basic source of data, possibly transforming the data along the way.
StringUtil Miscellaneous string utility methods.
TypedHashSet<E> A hash set that silently ignores operations on any elements other than those with a specific type.
URIUtil Utility class for performing operations on universal resource identifiers.
 

Package org.forgerock.openig.util Description

Miscellaneous utility classes.
